title: Winter Wonder Lulu
body: I'm not sure if this is intended or not, but Pix has a purple aura around him instead of something like a white or blue in the Winter Wonder Lulu skin. I would think it would be changed to match the winter theme.

replies.body:
Hiya! Thanks for the report! :)

Ah, it looks like you're right! I took a peek and what her original PBE images looked like, and it seems like he had some sort of white glittery/snow particles. I'll toss in a bug ticket for this!
You're welcome, thanks for addressing this. {{champion:117}}
